**Referral Reward:** \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"THANKS-SARAH\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" given to referred friend - $20 off first visit; **Partner Code:** Bulk generated codes for corporate partner employees - 15% off, unlimited use; **Win-Back:** \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"COMEBACK\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" sent to inactive customers - 40% off, 30-day expiry; **Membership Perk:** Members auto-get 10% off all bookings, stacks with other discounts up to 30% max;
